hmr: an kuoma chun, Sipaihai LALPA chun hieng hin a ti a nih: Hieng ang bawk hin, bêl hemtu bûr chu miin siem ṭhat nâwk thei ni ta loa a suksiet ang hin hi khawpui le hi hnam hi ka suksiet ding a nih; chuongchun, inphûmna ding um naw khawp rauin Tophetha chun inphûm an tih.

en: Thus will I do unto this place, saith Jehovah, and to the inhabitants thereof, even making this city as Topheth:
hmr: Hi hmun hi Topheth ang ela siemin, hi hmun hluotuhai chunga le hi hmun chunga hin ka thaw ding a nih, LALPA chun a tih.

en: and the houses of Jerusalem, and the houses of the kings of Judah, which are defiled, shall be as the place of Topheth, even all the houses upon whose roofs they have burned incense unto all the host of heaven, and have poured out drink-offerings unto other gods.
hmr: Jerusalem inhai le Juda lalhai inhai sukpawrchea lo um tahai chu Topheth hmun ang lo ni tâng a ta, in a chunga vâna umhai po po kuoma riminhnik an lo râwna, pathienhai kuoma dâwnmi thilinhlânhai an lo bunthlâkna po pohai chu,” tiin.

en: Then came Jeremiah from Topheth, whither Jehovah had sent him to prophesy; and he stood in the court of Jehovah’s house, and said to all the people:
hmr: Chun, LALPAIN thuhril dinga a tirna Tophetha inthawk chun Jere- mia chu a hung a; LALPA in inhuon- na tuollaia chun a ngîr a, mipuihai po po kuoma chun,

en: Thus saith Jehovah of hosts, the God of Israel, Behold, I will bring upon this city and upon all its towns all the evil that I have pronounced against it; because they have made their neck stiff, that they may not hear my words.
hmr: “Sipaihai LALPA Israel Pathien chun hieng hin a tih. Ngai ta u, a chunga tlung dinga ka lo hril ta po po, thil ṭha naw po po chu hi khawpui le a khawperhai po po chunga chun ka hung intlungtir ding a nih, anni chun an lungril an sukngar a; ka thuhai chu an ngai nawna dingin,” a ta.

en: And the word of Jehovah came to me, saying,
hmr: Chun, LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung a,

en: Go, and cry in the ears of Jerusalem, saying, Thus saith Jehovah, I remember for thee the kindness of thy youth, the love of thine espousals; how thou wentest after me in the wilderness, in a land that was not sown.
hmr: “Fe la, Jerusalem na bula chun khêk la, hieng hin hril rawh, LALPA chun hieng hin a tih; mo anga i hmangaina le, i tleirâwl lai lungin- sietna; khânga ram chi thea um nawna hmuna, thlalêra ka hnung i hung zui kha ka hriet zing a.

en: Israel was holiness unto Jehovah, the first-fruits of his increase: all that devour him shall be held guilty; evil shall come upon them, saith Jehovah.
hmr: Israel hi LALPA ta dinga in- thieng, a hlâwkna ra hmasa tak chu a na; ama fa zotuhai po po chu suola ngai nîng an ta, an chunga chun thil ṭha naw tlung a tih, LALPA chun a tih.”

en: Hear ye the word of Jehovah, O house of Jacob, and all the families of the house of Israel:
hmr: Aw Jakob sûngkuo le, Israel sûngkaw pahnamhai po po, LALPA thu chu ngai ta u;

en: Thus saith Jehovah, What unrighteousness have your fathers found in me, that they are gone far from me, and have walked after vanity, and are become vain?
hmr: LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: “In thlatuhai khan keimaa hin ieng fel nawna am an hmu a, keimaa in- thawka hlataka khan an fe hmang a, teplo khata chun an fe a, teplo an hung chang el a nih a?

en: Neither said they, Where is Jehovah that brought us up out of the land of Egypt, that led us through the wilderness, through a land of deserts and of pits, through a land of drought and of the shadow of death, through a land that none passed through, and where no man dwelt?
hmr: Anni chun, ‘Aigupta rama in- thawka eini mi hung ṭhuoi suok a, thlalêra le, ram thlalêr le khur hmun le, ram ṭâwltak le thina hlim ram le, ram mi tukhawm an fethleng ngai nawna le, mi tukhawm chêng nawna rama mi ṭhuoitu LALPA kha khaw lai am a um a? khawm an ti nawh.

en: And I brought you into a plentiful land, to eat the fruit thereof and the goodness thereof; but when ye entered, ye defiled my land, and made my heritage an abomination.
hmr: Chun, ram chênghnâwngtak, chutaka ra le a ṭhatna chu fa dingin ka ṭhuoi lût cheu a; amiruokchu, in lût chun, ka ram chu in sukpawrcheh a, ka rochan chu tirdakumah in siem ta a ni kha.

en: The priests said not, Where is Jehovah? and they that handle the law knew me not: the rulers also transgressed against me, and the prophets prophesied by Baal, and walked after things that do not profit.
hmr: Thiempuhai khawm chun, “LAL- PA kha khaw lai am a um a?” khawm an ti nawh a; dân hmangtuhai hlak chun an mi hriet bawk nawh: rorêl- tuhai khawm chun ka chungah an bawsiet a, zâwlneihai khawm chun Baal hmangin thu an hril a, thil a hlâwkna um dêr lohai chu an hnawt ta lem a.

en: Wherefore I will yet contend with you, saith Jehovah, and with your children’s children will I contend.
hmr: “Chuleiin, LALPA chun, nangnia chun hung phût ka ta, in nauhai nauhai chunga chen chun ka hung phût ding a nih, a tih.

en: For pass over to the isles of Kittim, and see; and send unto Kedar, and consider diligently; and see if there hath been such a thing.
hmr: Kittim thlierkârhai chu kai unla, va en ta u; Kedara khawm chun mî tir unla, nguntakin ngaituo ta u; chuong ang thil chu a um hrim am en fie ta u.

en: Hath a nation changed its gods, which yet are no gods? but my people have changed their glory for that which doth not profit.
hmr: Hnamhai chun an pathienhai, pathien tak ni lohai hnam chu an thleng am a nih? amiruokchu, ka mihai chun, ienga khawm ṭhahnem lo le chun an ropuina chu an thleng a ni hi.

en: Be astonished, O ye heavens, at this, and be horribly afraid, be ye very desolate, saith Jehovah.
hmr: Aw nangni vânhai, hi chunga hin makti unla, a ṭitin ṭi unla, nasa- taka râusanin um ro, LALPA chun a tih.

en: For my people have committed two evils: they have forsaken me, the fountain of living waters, and hewed them out cisterns, broken cisterns, that can hold no water.
hmr: Ka mihai chun thil ṭha naw pahni chu an thaw ta sih a; kei tui hringhai tuikhur chu an mi mâksan a, tuisunsuohai an cho a, tuisunsuo ṭehai, tui intling thei lohai chu.

en: Is Israel a servant? is he a home-born slave? why is he become a prey?
hmr: Israel hi siehlaw a nîm a nih? Sal pu ina pieng am a nih? Iengdinga tawktar chau a ni el am a nih aw?

en: The young lions have roared upon him, and yelled; and they have made his land waste: his cities are burned up, without inhabitant.
hmr: Sakeibaknei tuoihai chun an inrûm khum a, an inhûk a: a ram chu an suksiet a; a khawpuihai khawm a hluotuhai um loin a kâng zo tah a.

en: The children also of Memphis and Tahpanhes have broken the crown of thy head.
hmr: Noph le Tahpanhes thlahai el khawm chun i lua lallukhum chu an sukṭiek el a ni ta hi.

en: Hast thou not procured this unto thyself, in that thou hast forsaken Jehovah thy God, when he led thee by the way?
hmr: Lampuia chun a ṭhuoi lai chea, LALPA i Pathien i nghatsan khan, hi hi nang chun i nei tlat ni lo am a nih?

en: And now what hast thou to do in the way to Egypt, to drink the waters of the Shihor? or what hast thou to do in the way to Assyria, to drink the waters of the River?
hmr: Chuongchun, tuhin, Aigupta fena lampuia chun Sihor tuihai chu dâwn dingin ieng am thâwng i ta? Annawleh, Assuria fêna lampuia Vadungpui tuihai chu dâwn dingin ieng am thâwng i ta?

en: Thine own wickedness shall correct thee, and thy backslidings shall reprove thee: know therefore and see that it is an evil thing and a bitter, that thou hast forsaken Jehovah thy God, and that my fear is not in thee, saith the Lord, Jehovah of hosts.
hmr: Nangma rîtlona ngei chun suk- dik a ti cheh a, i hnungtawlnahai chun nang chu kâwk a ti che; chulei- in, LALPA i Pathien chu i nghatsan a, keima ṭina chu nangmaa hrim a um naw hi, thil rilotak le, thil kha a nih ti hi hmu la, hre rawh, LALPA, sipaihai LALPA chun a tih.

en: For of old time I have broken thy yoke, and burst thy bonds; and thou saidst, I will not serve; for upon every high hill and under every green tree thou didst bow thyself, playing the harlot.
hmr: Inhmâta inthawk khan i rîng- kawl chu i sukthliek a, i khuopnahai chu i suktan a, chun, nang chun, ‘Bawse ta naw ningah,’ i ta; muol insâng tinahai le thing hring hnuoi tinahai chun, nawchizawr anga khawsain nang chu i kûn ta sih a.

en: Yet I had planted thee a noble vine, wholly a right seed: how then art thou turned into the degenerate branches of a foreign vine unto me?
hmr: Grêp hrui ṭha mi, a chi indik tak ela ka phun vei che leh, iengtiziea ka ta dinga grêphrui danglam kûng suoka hung inchang el am i ni leh?

en: For though thou wash thee with lye, and take thee much soap, yet thine iniquity is marked before me, saith the Lord Jehovah.
hmr: Changalin în sâwp a, sâbawn tamtak i hmanga chu, i suolna chu ka hmaa chun a la chieng rawp a nih, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih.

en: How canst thou say, I am not defiled, I have not gone after the Baalim? see thy way in the valley, know what thou hast done: thou art a swift dromedary traversing her ways;
hmr: Iengtin am ‘Sukpawrchein ka um nawh a, Baal khawm chu ka zui nawh a,’ ti thei i ta? Phairuoma i lampui chu en la, i thaw tahai chu hre bawk rawh; sanghâwngsei tuoi hrât- tak a lampuihai thlep kawi kawi le;

en: a wild ass used to the wilderness, that snuffeth up the wind in her desire; in her occasion who can turn her away? all they that seek her will not weary themselves; in her month they shall find her.
hmr: thlalêra sabengtung hel, a châk- na anga hnâr inlên ruoi ang chu i nih; ama châkna chu tuin am her hmang thei an ta? Ama zawngtuhai po po chu anni insuksâwl naw raw hai se, ama chu a huna chun hmusuok el an tih.

en: Withhold thy foot from being unshod, and thy throat from thirst. But thou saidst, It is in vain; no, for I have loved strangers, and after them will I go.
hmr: I keah kekawk bun loin um naw la, i hnuk khawm dangchârin sie naw rawh; nang ruok chun, ‘Beiseina a um ta nawh, mi hmêlmakhai chu ka hma- ngai a, anni hnung chu zui el ka tih’ i tih a.

en: As the thief is ashamed when he is found, so is the house of Israel ashamed; they, their kings, their princes, and their priests, and their prophets;
hmr: “Inru chu hmusuok a ni pha chun ân zak angin, Israel sûngkuo khawm chu chuong ang chun ân zak a nih; anni le an lalhai, an rorêltuhai, an thiempuhai, an zâwlneihai chun,

en: who say to a stock, Thou art my father; and to a stone, Thou hast brought me forth: for they have turned their back unto me, and not their face; but in the time of their trouble they will say, Arise, and save us.
hmr: thingbul kuoma chun, ‘Nang hi ka pa i nih,’ an ta, lung kuoma chun, ‘Nang hin i mi nei a,’ an tih a, an hmai tieng ni loin, an hnung an mîn nghat ta sih a; an buoi lai huna ruok chun, ‘Hung tho la, mi sanhim rawh,’ an ta.

en: But where are thy gods that thou hast made thee? let them arise, if they can save thee in the time of thy trouble: for according to the number of thy cities are thy gods, O Judah.
hmr: Anleh, i pathienhai i ta dinga i siemhai kha khaw lai am an um a? I buoi lai huna an sanhim thei che chun inthotir ta la; i khawpuihai tamzie ang peiin i pathienhai chu an tam sih a, Aw Juda.

en: Wherefore will ye contend with me? ye all have transgressed against me, saith Jehovah.
hmr: “Iengdingin am kei chu mi phût in ta? ka chungah in lo bawsiet vawng ta sih a, LALPA chun a tih.

en: In vain have I smitten your children; they received no correction: your own sword hath devoured your prophets, like a destroying lion.
hmr: A thlâwn elin in thlahai chu ka lo vuok tah a; ṭhat phanain an hmang si nawh; sakeibaknei hnukinrâwl ang elin nangni kâwlhnâm ngei chun in zâwlneihai a fâk zo a ni hi.

en: O generation, see ye the word of Jehovah. Have I been a wilderness unto Israel? or a land of thick darkness? wherefore say my people, We are broken loose; we will come no more unto thee?
hmr: Aw nangni suon hai, LALPA thu chu en ta u, ka mihai chun, ‘Kan suok fel ta a, nangma kuoma chu hung ta naw ning ung,’ an tina dingin, Israel- hai kuoma chun thlalêr amanih, ram inthim sâmup am ka lo nih a ni?

en: Can a virgin forget her ornaments, or a bride her attire? yet my people have forgotten me days without number.
hmr: Nunghâk chun ân cheina thuom- hnaw chu a theinghilin, mo chun a mo puon chu a theinghil thei am a nih? Ka mihai ruok chun nihai tiem sêng loa inthawk tah an mi theinghil a nih.

en: How trimmest thou thy way to seek love! therefore even the wicked women hast thou taught thy ways.
hmr: Hmangaina zawng dingin i lam- pui chu ieng ang lâwmin am i uluk a! nuhmei rilohai ngei khawm chu i lampuihai chu în chûktir hiel el a.

en: Also in thy skirts is found the blood of the souls of the innocent poor: thou didst not find them breaking in; but it is because of all these things.
hmr: I fênthuoa khawm mi rimsi, pawitâwklohai thisen chu hmu a ni si a; an rawk laitaka man si loin. Hieng po po bâka hin nang chun,

en: Yet thou saidst, I am innocent; surely his anger is turned away from me. Behold, I will enter into judgment with thee, because thou sayest, I have not sinned.
hmr: ‘Pawitâwklo ka nih; matheiloin i lunginsenna chu keimaa inthawkin inkieng ngei a tih,’ i tih a. Ngai ta, ‘Ka suksuol nawh’ i ti lei chun i chungah ro ka rêl ding a nih.

en: Why gaddest thou about so much to change thy way? thou shalt be ashamed of Egypt also, as thou wast ashamed of Assyria.
hmr: I lampuihai chu thleng dingin ieng dinga în vâkvêl ruoi am a na? Assuriain a sukmuolpho che ang bawkin Aigupta khawma la hung sukmuolpho a ti che.

en: From thence also shalt thou go forth, with thy hands upon thy head: for Jehovah hath rejected those in whom thou trustest, and thou shalt not prosper with them.
hmr: Amaa inthawk khawm chun fe suok i ta, i kuthai chu i lu chunga siein; LALPA chun i ringhai chu a pawmpêk ta si naw cheh a, chuonga- hai chun hlawtling ta ngai naw ti nih.

en: Now Pashhur, the son of Immer the priest, who was chief officer in the house of Jehovah, heard Jeremiah prophesying these things.
hmr: Tûn LALPA ina hotu lientak, Immer naupa thiempu Pas- hur chun hieng thuhai hi Jeremia chun a hril ti a lo hriet a.

en: Then Pashhur smote Jeremiah the prophet, and put him in the stocks that were in the upper gate of Benjamin, which was in the house of Jehovah.
hmr: Pas-hur chun zâwlnei Jeremia chu a hrem a, LALPA ina Benjamin dai kawtkhâr chunghnung lema um, intângna ina chun a khum a.

en: And it came to pass on the morrow, that Pashhur brought forth Jeremiah out of the stocks. Then said Jeremiah unto him, Jehovah hath not called thy name Pashhur, but Magor-missabib.
hmr: A zinga chun; Pas-hur chun Jeremia chu intângna ina inthawk chun a hung ṭhuoi suok a. Jeremia chun a kuomah, “LALPA chun i hming hi Pas-hur a ti naw cheh a, Magor-missabib a ti lem che a nih.

en: For thus saith Jehovah, Behold, I will make thee a terror to thyself, and to all thy friends; and they shall fall by the sword of their enemies, and thine eyes shall behold it; and I will give all Judah into the hand of the king of Babylon, and he shall carry them captive to Babylon, and shall slay them with the sword.
hmr: LALPA chun hieng hin a ti sih a: Ngai ta, i ruolhai le nangma ngei ta dingin ṭiumah ka siem ding che a nih; chun, an hmêlmahai kâwlhnâma ngei chun tlûng an ta, chu chu i mit ngeiin hmûng i tih; chun, Juda ram po po chu Babulon lal kutah pêng ka ta, ama chun Babulon tieng salah ṭhuoi a ta, kâwlhnâmin anni chu that a tih.

en: Moreover I will give all the riches of this city, and all the gains thereof, and all the precious things thereof, yea, all the treasures of the kings of Judah will I give into the hand of their enemies; and they shall make them a prey, and take them, and carry them to Babylon.
hmr: Chu nawa khawm chun, hi khaw- puia hausaknahai po po, chutaka a thil hlâwkhai po po, chutaka a thil hluhai po po, anih, Juda lalhai ro thilhai po po el chu an hmêlmahai, anni suksea, anni ṭhuoia, Babulona fepuitu dinghai kuta chun ka pêk ding a nih.

en: And thou, Pashhur, and all that dwell in thy house shall go into captivity; and thou shalt come to Babylon, and there thou shalt die, and there shalt thou be buried, thou, and all thy friends, to whom thou hast prophesied falsely.
hmr: Chun, nang Pas-hur le i ina chênghai po po chu sala ṭhuoiin um in ta; Babulona chun fêng i tih; chutaka chun thîng i ta, chutaka phûm chu nîng i ta, nang le i ruolhai po po an kuoma thu indik lotaka i lo hril hlakhai le chun,” tiin.

en: O Jehovah, thou hast persuaded me, and I was persuaded; thou art stronger than I, and hast prevailed: I am become a laughing-stock all the day, every one mocketh me.
hmr: Aw LALPA, nang chun i mi lo aikei tah a, ailâkin ka um tah a, nang chu keia nêkin i hrât lem a, i hne tah a, sûnnithlâk elin nuizatbûr ka na, mi tin el chun an mi nuiêu a.

en: For as often as I speak, I cry out; I cry, Violence and destruction! because the word of Jehovah is made a reproach unto me, and a derision, all the day.
hmr: Thu ka hril zâtin ka khêk sih a; ka khêk a, “Thawluina le suksietna” tiin; LALPA thu chu ka ta dingin kâwkna le ni tin tinin mi hrilinsîma siem a na.

en: And if I say, I will not make mention of him, nor speak any more in his name, then there is in my heart as it were a burning fire shut up in my bones, and I am weary with forbearing, and I cannot contain.
hmr: Chun, ama chanchin hi hril nâwng ka ta, a hmingin thu hril naw ningah, ti ding ni lang, ka ruhai sûnga mei khâr nela chawk ang elin ka lungrila hin a um a, ka topui ṭawk ṭawk thei nawh a, ka umpui thei nawh a.

en: For I have heard the defaming of many, terror on every side. Denounce, and we will denounce him, say all my familiar friends, they that watch for my fall; peradventure he will be persuaded, and we shall prevail against him, and we shall take our revenge on him.
hmr: Sîr tina ṭium le, mi tamtakhai hrilsietna chu ka hriet a. Ka ruol, hmêlhriettakhai, ka tlûk nghâktuhai chun, “Hril se ro, ama chu hrilsieng ei ta, ama chu ailâkin um a ta, ama chu hnêng ei ta, ama chunga chun ei phuba chu lâng ei tih,” an tih a.

en: But Jehovah is with me as a mighty one and a terrible: therefore my persecutors shall stumble, and they shall not prevail; they shall be utterly put to shame, because they have not dealt wisely, even with an everlasting dishonor which shall never be forgotten.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, LALPA chu mi thilthawtheitak le ṭium angin ka kuoma chun a um a; chuleiin, a mi sukrinumtuhai chu insui thlûng an ta, hlawtling naw ni hai; vartaka an lo thaw ta naw leiin, anni chu kum- khuoa theinghil ta lo ding inza- puiuma chun inzak ngei an tih.

en: But, O Jehovah of hosts, that triest the righteous, that seest the heart and the mind, let me see thy vengeance on them; for unto thee have I revealed my cause.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, aw sipaihai LALPA mi fel chu fieh a, lungril le lungvar hmutu, anni chunga i phu- balâk chu mîn hmutir la; nangma kuoma ngei chun ka chungthu chu ka hung târlang sih a.

en: Sing unto Jehovah, praise ye Jehovah; for he hath delivered the soul of the needy from the hand of evil-doers.
hmr: LALPA kuoma chun hla sak unla, LALPA chu inpâk ro; thil suol thawtuhai kuta inthawk chun mi tlasam thlarau chu a sansuok sih a.

en: Cursed be the day wherein I was born: let not the day wherein my mother bare me be blessed.
hmr: Ka piengna ni chu ṭawngse- phurin um raw se: ka nuin a mi nei ni chu malsâwmin um naw raw se.

en: Cursed be the man who brought tidings to my father, saying, A man-child is born unto thee; making him very glad.
hmr: Mi ka pa kuoma, “I ta dingin naupasal a pieng ie,” tia ama sukhlim a, a kuoma thu hung intluntu chu ṭawngsephurin um raw se.

en: And let that man be as the cities which Jehovah overthrew, and repented not: and let him hear a cry in the morning, and shouting at noontime;
hmr: Chun, chu mi LALPAIN khaw- puihai insîrna nei loa a sukchimhai ang chu ni raw se; zîngtieng chun khêkri inhriettir la, sûn huna chun ṭitrâwl inhriettir bawk la;

en: because he slew me not from the womb; and so my mother would have been my grave, and her womb always great.
hmr: ama chun sula chun a mi suk- hlum ta naw leiin; chuong ni sien chu ka nu chu ka thlân lo ni tâng a ta, a sul chun mi vawn zing el ding bah.

en: Wherefore came I forth out of the womb to see labor and sorrow, that my days should be consumed with shame?
hmr: Ieng dinga sininrimna le lung- ngaina hi hmu dinga, ka nihai chu inzaknaa sukbohmanga um dinga hi sula hung suok am ka nih aw?

en: The word which came unto Jeremiah from Jehovah, when king Zedekiah sent unto him Pashhur the son of Malchijah, and Zephaniah the son of Maaseiah, the priest, saying,
hmr: Lal Zedekiain a kuoma Malkija naupa Pas-hur le thiempu Maaseia naupa Zephania hieng thu hril dinga a tir laia Jeremia kuoma LALPA thu hung tlung chu:

en: Inquire, I pray thee, of Jehovah for us; for Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon maketh war against us: peradventure Jehovah will deal with us according to all his wondrous works, that he may go up from us.
hmr: anni chun, “Kan ngên che, kan ta dingin LALPA chu thu mîn dawnpêk rawh; Nebukadnezzar Babulon lal chun keini hi a mi hung do a; keinia inthawka a kîr theina dingin, a thilthaw maktakhai ang po po khan LALPA chun keini a mi thawpêk ding âwm am” an ta.

en: Then said Jeremiah unto them, Thus shall ye say to Zedekiah:
hmr: Jeremia chun an kuomah, “Zede- kia kuoma chun hieng hin hril ro:

en: Thus saith Jehovah, the God of Israel, Behold, I will turn back the weapons of war that are in your hands, wherewith ye fight against the king of Babylon, and against the Chaldeans that besiege you, without the walls; and I will gather them into the midst of this city.
hmr: Israel Pathien, LALPA chun hieng hin a tih. Ngai ta, in kuta indona hriemhrei kul puoa, nangni hung inhuoltuhai cheu, Babulon lal le Kaldaihai i donahai chu inherkîrtir ka ta, hi khawpui sûnga hin anni chu kei khâwm ka tih.

en: And I myself will fight against you with an outstretched hand and with a strong arm, even in anger, and in wrath, and in great indignation.
hmr: Keima ngeiin bân phar le kut hrât- in, lunginsenna le, ṭitumna le nasa- taka lunginthakna leh do ka ti cheh a.

en: And I will smite the inhabitants of this city, both man and beast: they shall die of a great pestilence.
hmr: Chuongchun, hi khawpui hluotu- hai ramsa le mihriemhai ngei chu hrem ka ta, hripui nasataka chun thîng an tih.

en: And afterward, saith Jehovah, I will deliver Zedekiah king of Judah, and his servants, and the people, even such as are left in this city from the pestilence, from the sword, and from the famine, into the hand of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon, and into the hand of their enemies, and into the hand of those that seek their life: and he shall smite them with the edge of the sword; he shall not spare them, neither have pity, nor have mercy.
hmr: Chu hnunga chun, LALPA chun a tih: Juda lal Zedekia le, a siehlawhai le, mipuihai, hi khawpuia hripuia in- thawka hlaa la umhai, kâwlhnâm le ṭâma inthawka la hlaa umhai chu Babulon lal Nebukadnezzar kuta dâm, an hmêlmahai kuta dâm, an hringna lâk tumtuhai kuta dâm chun pêng ka tih; chun, ama chun kâwl- hnâm ngeiin that a ta; anni chu hla naw nih a, lunginsiet bawk naw nih a, zângaina nei bawk naw ni.

en: And unto this people thou shalt say, Thus saith Jehovah: Behold, I set before you the way of life and the way of death.
hmr: Chun, hi hnam kuoma hin hieng hin hril rawh: LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: Ngai ta, i hmaa chun hringna lampui le thina lampui chu ka sieh a.

en: He that abideth in this city shall die by the sword, and by the famine, and by the pestilence; but he that goeth out, and passeth over to the Chaldeans that besiege you, he shall live, and his life shall be unto him for a prey.
hmr: Tukhawm hi khawpui sûnga um chu kâwlhnâmin, ṭâmin, hripuiin thîng a ta, amiruokchu, mi fe suok a, mi ân huoltuhai cheu Kaldaihai kuoma vân pe chu hring a ta, a hringna chu indona Lâwmman angin nei a tih.

en: For I have set my face upon this city for evil, and not for good, saith Jehovah: it shall be given into the hand of the king of Babylon, and he shall burn it with fire.
hmr: Thil ṭha tiengah ni lovin, thil ṭha naw tiengah hi khawpui chunga hin ka hmai kân nghat ta sih a, LALPA chun a tih: Babulon lal kuta pêk nîng a ta, ama chun meiin râwng a tih.

en: And touching the house of the king of Judah, hear ye the word of Jehovah:
hmr: Juda lal sûngkaw chungthua chun LALPA thu chu lo ngai ta u:

en: O house of David, thus saith Jehovah, Execute justice in the morning, and deliver him that is robbed out of the hand of the oppressor, lest my wrath go forth like fire, and burn so that none can quench it, because of the evil of your doings.
hmr: Aw David sûngkuo, LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: Zîngtieng chun rorêlna chu tirsuok la, nêksâwrtu kuta inthawk chun suksieta um chu sansuok la; chuong naw chun, in thil- thawhai rîtlo leiin, mei angin ka lunginsenna chu fe suok a ta, tukhawm ṭhel ruol loin chawk a tih.

en: Behold, I am against thee, O inhabitant of the valley, and of the rock of the plain, saith Jehovah; you that say, Who shall come down against us? or who shall enter into our habitations?
hmr: Aw phairuom le, phaia lungpui hmun hluotuhai, ngai ta u, nangni ka dodâl cheu a nih, LALPA chun a tih: nangni chun, “Ei chungah tu am hung thlâng a ta? Tu am ei chêngnaa hin hung lût a ta?” in tih a;

en: And I will punish you according to the fruit of your doings, saith Jehovah; and I will kindle a fire in her forest, and it shall devour all that is round about her.
hmr: in thilthaw ra ang peiin ka hrem ding cheu a nih, LALPA chun a tih; a rampui hnuoia chun mei sêm ka ta, a sîra um po pohai chu kâng hmang vawng a tih.

en: Thus said Jehovah: Go down to the house of the king of Judah, and speak there this word,
hmr: LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: Juda lal ina chun fe thla la, chutaka chun hi thu hi zu hril rawh:

en: and say, Hear the word of Jehovah, O king of Judah, that sittest upon the throne of David, thou, and thy servants, and thy people that enter in by these gates.
hmr: Aw nang Juda lal, David lal- ṭhungphaa ṭhung, nang le i siehlaw- hai le i mihai, hieng dai kawtkhâr- haia lûthai hin LALPA thu chu lo ngai ta u.

en: Thus saith Jehovah: Execute ye justice and righteousness, and deliver him that is robbed out of the hand of the oppressor: and do no wrong, do no violence, to the sojourner, the fatherless, nor the widow; neither shed innocent blood in this place.
hmr: LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: Felna le rorêlna chu tirsuok unla, nêksâwrtu kuta inthawk suksieta um chu sansuok ro; thil dik naw chu thaw naw unla, thawluina chu thaw naw unla, hmeithaihai le, mikhuolhai le pa neilohai chunga chun; hi hmuna hin mi thiem thisen chu insuo bawk naw ro.

en: For if ye do this thing indeed, then shall there enter in by the gates of this house kings sitting upon the throne of David, riding in chariots and on horses, he, and his servants, and his people.
hmr: Hieng thilhai hi in thaw ngei ngei chun, hi hi dai kawtkhârahai hin, David lalṭhungphaa ṭhung lalhai, sakawr tawlailîra le sakawr chung- haia chuong, ama le a siehlawhai le a mihai, lût um an tih.

en: But if ye will not hear these words, I swear by myself, saith Jehovah, that this house shall become a desolation.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, hieng thuhai hi in ngai naw chun, LALPA chun a tih: keima ngei insâlin kân khâm a, hi in hi rausan ni ngei a tih.

en: For thus saith Jehovah concerning the house of the king of Judah: Thou art Gilead unto me, and the head of Lebanon; yet surely I will make thee a wilderness, and cities which are not inhabited.
hmr: Juda lal in chungthua chun LALPA chun hieng hin a ti sih a: Ka ta ding chun Gilead i na, Lebanon lu leh; nisienlakhawm, matheiloin thla- lêra le khawpui hluo loah ka siem ding che a nih.

en: And I will prepare destroyers against thee, every one with his weapons; and they shall cut down thy choice cedars, and cast them into the fire.
hmr: I chunga chun suksetuhai, mi tin el chu mâni hriemhrei seng leh, ka buotsai ding a nih; anni chun i ditthlang sidar dâm chu sât thlâng an ta, meiah tîng an tih.

en: And many nations shall pass by this city, and they shall say every man to his neighbor, Wherefore hath Jehovah done thus unto this great city?
hmr: Hnam tamtakhai chun hi khaw- pui hi fekhêl an ta, mi tin chun mâni tuolbâwm kuoma chun, “Iengtiziea hi khawpui ropuitak hi LALPAIN hieng- a a thaw el am a na?” tîng an tih.

en: Then they shall answer, Because they forsook the covenant of Jehovah their God, and worshipped other gods, and served them.
hmr: Chun, anni chun, “LALPA an Pathien thuthlung chu an nghatsan a, pathien danghai an biek a, an rawng an bâwl leiin a nih,” tiin dawn an tih.

en: Weep ye not for the dead, neither bemoan him; but weep sore for him that goeth away; for he shall return no more, nor see his native country.
hmr: Mithi ta dingin ṭap naw unla, ama chu sûn bawk naw ro; ami- ruokchu, mi a fe hmang ta ding chun nasatakin ṭap unla; ama chu a hung kîr ta naw ding lei le, a piengna ram chu a hmu ta naw ding leiin.

en: For thus saith Jehovah touching Shallum the son of Josiah, king of Judah, who reigned instead of Josiah his father, and who went forth out of this place: He shall not return thither any more;
hmr: Juda lal Josia naupa Sallum a pa aia rorêla, hi hmun mâksantu chungthua chun LALPA chun hieng- hin a ti sih a:

en: but in the place whither they have led him captive, there shall he die, and he shall see this land no more.
hmr: “Hitaka hin ama chu hung kîr nâwk ta naw ni; amiruokchu, ama chu sala an ṭhuoina hmuna chun, chutaka chun thîng a ta, hi ram hi hmu nâwk ta naw ni,” tiin.

en: Woe unto him that buildeth his house by unrighteousness, and his chambers by injustice; that useth his neighbor’s service without wages, and giveth him not his hire;
hmr: A in fel nawnaa bâwltu le, a pindanhai indik lonaa bâwltu chu a chung a rik; ama chun a tuolbâwm sinthawna chu man boin a hmang a, a hlaw khawm a pêk nawh a;

en: that saith, I will build me a wide house and spacious chambers, and cutteth him out windows; and it is ceiled with cedar, and painted with vermilion.
hmr: ama chun, “In lientak ka ta dingin bâwl ka ta, pindan chung- hnung lien tâwktak hai leh” a ta. Chuongchun, tukverhai a siem a, sidar thingin a sûng ân thuo a, rawng sen a nâl a.

en: Shalt thou reign, because thou strivest to excel in cedar? Did not thy father eat and drink, and do justice and righteousness? then it was well with him.
hmr: Sidara în huon khum leiin lalah în ngai am a nih? I pa chun a fâkin a dâwn a, indikna le rorêlna chu a thaw a ni nâwm a nih? Chuongchun, ama ta ding chun a hung ṭhah a.

en: He judged the cause of the poor and needy; then it was well. Was not this to know me? saith Jehovah.
hmr: Mi tlasamhai le mi rimsihai chungthu chu a rêl a, chuongchun, a ṭhah a. Hi hi keima mi hre dingin a ni nâwm a nih? LALPA chun a tih.

en: But thine eyes and thy heart are not but for thy covetousness, and for shedding innocent blood, and for oppression, and for violence, to do it.
hmr: Amiruokchu, nanga mithai le i lungril chu inhnarna le, mi thiem thisen insuona ding le, nêksâwrna ding le, thawluina ding le, chu chu thawnaa ding chau naw chu thil dang ding a ni nawh a.

en: Therefore thus saith Jehovah concerning Jehoiakim the son of Josiah, king of Judah: they shall not lament for him, saying, Ah my brother! or, Ah sister! They shall not lament for him, saying Ah lord! or, Ah his glory!
hmr: Chuleiin, Juda lal Josia naupa Jehoiakim chungthua chun LALPAIN hieng hin a tih: Ama chu “Aw ka unaupa,” tiin amanih, “Aw farnu,” tiin amanih, sûn naw ni hai a; “Aw lalpa,” tiin amanih, “Aw a ropuina chu,” tiin amanih, sûn bawk naw ni hai.

en: He shall be buried with the burial of an ass, drawn and cast forth beyond the gates of Jerusalem.
hmr: Sabengtung phûm angin phûm an ta, Jerusalem dai kawtkhârhai khêla hnûka kei dawkin.

en: Go up to Lebanon, and cry; and lift up thy voice in Bashan, and cry from Abarim; for all thy lovers are destroyed.
hmr: Lebanona chun hang fe la, hang khêk rawh: Basana inthawk chun i râwl insuo la, Abarima inthawk chun khêk rawh: i hmangaihai po po chu an bohmang vawng ta sih a.

en: I spake unto thee in thy prosperity; but thou saidst, I will not hear. This hath been thy manner from thy youth, that thou obeyedst not my voice.
hmr: I vângneinaa chun i kuomah thu ka hril a; amiruokchu, nang chun, “Ngai naw ning,” i tih a. I naupang laia inthawk tah hi hi i khawsak dân a ni hrim a; ka râwl hi i ngai ngai nawh.

en: The wind shall feed all thy shepherds, and thy lovers shall go into captivity: surely then shalt thou be ashamed and confounded for all thy wickedness.
hmr: I berâmpuhai po po chu thliin châwm a ta, i hmangaihai chu salah intâng an tih: chu pha chun mathei- loin, i khawhlonahai po po lei chun inzak i ta, buoi ngei ngei i tih.

en: O inhabitant of Lebanon, that makest thy nest in the cedars, how greatly to be pitied shalt thou be when pangs come upon thee, the pain as of a woman in travail!
hmr: Aw Lebanon hluotu, sidar thinghaia bu septu, nuhmei nauhase nat anga natna, i chunga tuornahai a hung tlung pha chun lungsiet i va um âwm de!

en: As I live, saith Jehovah, though Coniah the son of Jehoiakim king of Judah were the signet upon my right hand, yet would I pluck thee thence;
hmr: LALPA chun, ka hring zing angin, Jehoiakim naupa Konia chu ka kut changtienga kutsebi sûng- phûm ni sienla khawm, chutaka inthawk chun hmalthlâng ka ti che;

en: and I will give thee into the hand of them that seek thy life, and into the hand of them of whom thou art afraid, even into the hand of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon, and into the hand of the Chaldeans.
hmr: chun, nangma hringna zawng- tuhai kuta le, i ṭi Babulon lal Nebukadnezzar le Kaldaihai kuta chun pêng ka ti che.

en: And I will cast thee out, and thy mother that bare thee, into another country, where ye were not born; and there shall ye die.
hmr: Peisuok ka ti cheh a, i nu chun ram dangah paw lût a ti cheh a, i piengna ram ni loa chun, chutaka chun thîng i tih.

en: But to the land whereunto their soul longeth to return, thither shall they not return.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, ram an lung- rilin kîr an nuomna tieng chun kîr nâwk naw ni hai.

en: Is this man Coniah a despised broken vessel? is he a vessel wherein none delighteth? wherefore are they cast out, he and his seed, and are cast into the land which they know not?
hmr: Hi Konia hi bêl kawi hmusitum am a nih? Ama hi bêl amaa ditna um hlek lo am a nih? Iengdinga pei suoka, ama le a chihai, an ihriet naw rama chu pei suoka um am an na?

en: O earth, earth, earth, hear the word of Jehovah.
hmr: Aw leihnuoi, leihnuoi, leihnuoi, LALPA thu chu ngai ta.

en: Thus saith Jehovah, Write ye this man childless, a man that shall not prosper in his days; for no more shall a man of his seed prosper, sitting upon the throne of David, and ruling in Judah.
hmr: LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: Hi pa hi nau boah, a dam sûnga mi hlawtling ngai lo dingin ziek rawh, ama chia mi hrim hrim hi tukhawm hlawtling ngai naw ni hai; David lalṭhungphaa ṭhung thua le, Juda rama ro la rêl pei ding thuah.

en: Woe unto the shepherds that destroy and scatter the sheep of my pasture! saith Jehovah.
hmr: Ka hlo petna hmuna berâmhai sukdara sukbohmanghai be- râmpuhai chu an chung a rik! LALPA chun a tih.

en: Therefore thus saith Jehovah, the God of Israel, against the shepherds that feed my people: Ye have scattered my flock, and driven them away, and have not visited them; behold, I will visit upon you the evil of your doings, saith Jehovah.
hmr: Chuleiin, Israel Pathien LALPA chun, ka mihai châwmtu berâmpuhai chungthua chun hieng hin a hril: Ka berâm ruolhai chu in hnawt dar a, in khal hmang tâwl tah a, anni chu in va sir ngai bawk nawh a; ngai ta u, in thilthaw rilohai chun ka hung sir ding cheu a nih, LALPA chun a tih.

en: And I will gather the remnant of my flock out of all the countries whither I have driven them, and will bring them again to their folds; and they shall be fruitful and multiply.
hmr: Ka berâm ruol laia hlâbîkhai chu, ram anni ka hnawt hmangna po poa inthawk chun hung ṭhuoi khâwm ka ta, an huonhaia chun hung ṭhuoi nâwk ka tih; chun, hung pung an ta, hung rahlâwk an tih.

en: And I will set up shepherds over them, who shall feed them; and they shall fear no more, nor be dismayed, neither shall any be lacking, saith Jehovah.
hmr: Anni châwmtu ding berâmpu an chunga chun sieng ka ta; ṭit khawm ṭi ta naw ni hai a, beidawng ngai ta bawk naw ni hai a, tlâksam hrim khawm um ta naw ni, LALPA chun a tih.

en: Behold, the days come, saith Jehovah, that I will raise unto David a righteous Branch, and he shall reign as king and deal wisely, and shall execute justice and righteousness in the land.
hmr: Ngai ta, nihai chu a hung tlung mêk; LALPA chun a tih: David-a hin kau feltak chu hung inṭotir ka ta, ama chun lal angin rorêl a ta, vartak- in thâwng a ta; rama chun rorêlna le felna chu suksuok a tih.

en: In his days Judah shall be saved, and Israel shall dwell safely; and this is his name whereby he shall be called: Jehovah our righteousness.
hmr: Ama dam sûng chun Juda chu sandam nîng a ta, Israel khawm chu himtakin chêng a tih, chun, hi hi hming ama kona ding chu nîng a ta, “LALPA chu ei felna a nih,” ti hi.

en: Therefore, behold, the days come, saith Jehovah, that they shall no more say, As Jehovah liveth, who brought up the children of Israel out of the land of Egypt;
hmr: Chuleiin, ngai ta, nihai chu a hung tlung mêk, LALPA chun a tih; Aigupta rama Israel thlahai ṭhuoi suoktu LALPA chu a hring zing angin, ṭi ta naw ni hai a,

en: but, As Jehovah liveth, who brought up and who led the seed of the house of Israel out of the north country, and from all the countries whither I had driven them. And they shall dwell in their own land.
hmr: Hmâr rama inthawk le anni ka hnawt hmangna ram po pohaia in- thawka Israel sûngkuo chu enkawla ṭhuoitu LALPA ti ni lem tâng a tih: chuongchun, anni ram ngeia chun chêng tâng an tih.

en: Concerning the prophets. My heart within me is broken, all my bones shake; I am like a drunken man, and like a man whom wine hath overcome, because of Jehovah, and because of his holy words.
hmr: Zâwlneihai chungthua chun; ka lungril chu ka sûnga chun a kawiseh a, ka ruhai po po khawm ân hnîng a; zu inrui mi, mi uoinin a hne zet ang el chu ka nih; LALPA lei le, LALPA thu inthienghai lei chun.

en: For the land is full of adulterers; for because of swearing the land mourneth; the pastures of the wilderness are dried up. And their course is evil, and their might is not right;
hmr: Ram chu uirehaiin an sip a, ṭawngsie lei chun ram chun a sûn a; thlalêra hlo petna hmunhai khawm chu a ṭâwl zo a; an lampuihai chu a ṭha nawh a, an hrâtna khawm chu ân dik nawh.

en: for both prophet and priest are profane; yea, in my house have I found their wickedness, saith Jehovah.
hmr: Thiempu le zâwlnei chu suk- pawrche an ni ve ve sih a; anih, ka ina chun an khawhlona chu ka hmu a nih, LALPA chun a tih.

en: Wherefore their way shall be unto them as slippery places in the darkness: they shall be driven on, and fall therein; for I will bring evil upon them, even the year of their visitation, saith Jehovah.
hmr: Chuleiin, an lampui chu an ta dingin inthim laia hmun innâltak ang chu nîng a ta; hnawtin um an ta, chutaka chun tlûng an tih, an chunga chun thil ṭha naw, anni hremna kum ngei chu ka hung intlungtir ding a ni sih a, LALPA chun a tih.

en: And I have seen folly in the prophets of Samaria; they prophesied by Baal, and caused my people Israel to err.
hmr: Samaria zâwlneihaia chun in- vêtna ka hmuh a, anni chun Baal hmangin thu an hril a, ka mi Israelhai chu an insuksuoltir a.

en: In the prophets of Jerusalem also I have seen a horrible thing: they commit adultery, and walk in lies; and they strengthen the hands of evil-doers, so that none doth return from his wickedness: they are all of them become unto me as Sodom, and the inhabitants thereof as Gomorrah.
hmr: Jerusalema zâwlneihaia khawm thil râpthlâktak ka hmuh a; anni chun uiretna thil an thawh a, thukhêlah an feh a, thilsuol thawtu kut chu an sukhrât a, chuongchun, tukhawm an khawhlonaa inthawkin an kîr nawh; an rêng el chun ka ta ding chun Sodom ang an na, chutaka a hluotuhai chu Gomorra ang an nih.

en: Therefore thus saith Jehovah of hosts concerning the prophets: Behold, I will feed them with wormwood, and make them drink the water of gall; for from the prophets of Jerusalem is ungodliness gone forth into all the land.
hmr: Chuleiin, zâwlneihai chung- thua chun sipaihai LALPA chun hieng hin a tih; Ngai ta, anni chu sairamkhain châwm ka ta, mîtkhâ tui indâwntir ka tih; Jerusalem zâwlneihaia inthawk chun ram po poa chun sukpawrchena chu a fe suok sih a.

en: Thus saith Jehovah of hosts, Hearken not unto the words of the prophets that prophesy unto you: they teach you vanity; they speak a vision of their own heart, and not out of the mouth of Jehovah.
hmr: Sipaihai LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: “In kuoma thuhriltu zâwlneihai thuhai chu ngai naw unla, anni chun teplo mei mei an inchûktir cheu a nih, an lungrila thil hmulâwk chu an hril a, LALPA baua inthawka mi chu ni loin.

en: They say continually unto them that despise me, Jehovah hath said, Ye shall have peace; and unto every one that walketh in the stubbornness of his own heart they say, No evil shall come upon you.
hmr: LALPA thuhai hmusittuhai kuoma chun, LALPA chun, ‘Thla- muongna nei in tih, a tih,’ an ti zing zing hlak a, chun, mi mâni lungril ngarzie ang peia um hlaktu kuoma khawm chun, ‘In chungah thil ṭha naw hung tlung naw nih,’ an ti bawk hlak a.

en: For who hath stood in the council of Jehovah, that he should perceive and hear his word? who hath marked my word, and heard it?
hmr: LALPA rorêlnaa chun tu am a thu chu hrea pawm dinga ngîr hlak? Tuin am a thuhai chu ân chikin a hriet hlak a?

en: Behold, the tempest of Jehovah, even his wrath, is gone forth, yea, a whirling tempest: it shall burst upon the head of the wicked.
hmr: Ngai ta u, LALPA thlipui chu, a lunginsenna chu, a fe suok a, anih, thlivir thlipui chu, mi khawhlo lu chunga chun hung nuoi a tih.

en: The anger of Jehovah shall not return, until he have executed, and till he have performed the intents of his heart: in the latter days ye shall understand it perfectly.
hmr: Thawa a um hmakhat chun LALPA lunginsenna chu hung kîr nâwk naw ni, a lungrila a thiltum a thaw hmakhat chun: hi hnung tienga chun la hung hre chieng hlêng in tih.

en: I sent not these prophets, yet they ran: I spake not unto them, yet they prophesied.
hmr: Hieng zâwlneihai hi ka tir nawh a, anachu, an tlân sih a; an kuoma chun thu khawm ka hril nawh a, anachu, anni chun thu an hril sih a.

en: But if they had stood in my council, then had they caused my people to hear my words, and had turned them from their evil way, and from the evil of their doings.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, ka rorêlnaa lo ngîr ta chu ni hai sienla, ka mihai chu ka thuhai chu inhriettir an ta, an thilthaw suolhaia inthawk le, an lampui suolhaia inthawk chun inkîr- tir tâng an tih.

en: Am I a God at hand, saith Jehovah, and not a God afar off?
hmr: LALPA chun, ‘Hlataka Pathien um ni loin, hnaitaka Pathien ka ni maw?’ a tih.

en: Can any hide himself in secret places so that I shall not see him? saith Jehovah. Do not I fill heaven and earth? saith Jehovah.
hmr: LALPA chun, ‘Mi tukhawm ka hmu lo dingah hmun fienrielahai ân bihmang thei am a nih?’ a tih. ‘Hnuoi le vân chu keia suksip a ni naw am a nih?’ LALPA chun a tih.

en: I have heard what the prophets have said, that prophesy lies in my name, saying, I have dreamed, I have dreamed.
hmr: ‘Mang ka nei, mang ka nei,’ tia ka hminga thukhêla thuhriltuhai, zâwlneihaiin an hril chu ka hriet a.

en: How long shall this be in the heart of the prophets that prophesy lies, even the prophets of the deceit of their own heart?
hmr: Zâwlnei thukhêl hriltuhai, anni lungril inhlêmnaa zâwlneihai chu, chuonghai lungrila chun hi hi ieng- chen am a um ding a na?

en: that think to cause my people to forget my name by their dreams which they tell every man to his neighbor, as their fathers forgat my name for Baal.
hmr: an thlatuhaiin Baal leia ka hming an theinghil anga, mi tinin mâni tuolbâwmhai kuomah an mang- hai an hrilin ka mihai chu ka hming intheinghiltir dingin an ngaituo a.

en: The prophet that hath a dream, let him tell a dream; and he that hath my word, let him speak my word faithfully. What is the straw to the wheat? saith Jehovah.
hmr: Zâwlnei mang nei chun a mang chu hril sienla, keima thu hretu chun keia thu chu ringumtakin hril bawk raw se. Bu le a kûng chun ieng am inangna an nei a? LALPA chun a tih.

en: Is not my word like fire? saith Jehovah; and like a hammer that breaketh the rock in pieces?
hmr: Ka thu chu mei ang a ni nâwm a nih, lungpui khawm suknawitu tu- bau ang chu? LALPA chun a tih.

en: Therefore, behold, I am against the prophets, saith Jehovah, that steal my words every one from his neighbor.
hmr: “Chuleichun, ngai ta u, zâwl- neihai mâni tuolbâwmhaia inthawka ka thu inrutuhai chu ka kal a nih, LALPA chun a tih.

en: Behold, I am against the prophets, saith Jehovah, that use their tongues, and say, He saith.
hmr: Ngai ta u, an leihai hmanga, ‘LALPAIN a hril,’ titu zâwlneihai chu ka kal a nih, LALPA chun a tih:

en: Behold, I am against them that prophesy lying dreams, saith Jehovah, and do tell them, and cause my people to err by their lies, and by their vain boasting: yet I sent them not, nor commanded them; neither do they profit this people at all, saith Jehovah.
hmr: Ngai ta u, mang indik lohai hrila, anni kuoma khawm hrila, an khêlhrilhai le, an uongna teplohaia ka mihai insuksuoltirtu zâwlneihai chu ka kal a nih, LALPA chun a tih; anni chu ka tir nawh a, thu khawm ka pêk nawh a; hi hnam hi suksâwt chuong dêr bawk naw ni hai, LALPA chun a tih.”

en: And when this people, or the prophet, or a priest, shall ask thee, saying, What is the burden of Jehovah? then shalt thou say unto them, What burden! I will cast you off, saith Jehovah.
hmr: Hi mihai laia pakhatin amanih, zâwlneiin amanih, thiempuin ama- nih, “LALPA rikphur chu ieng am a na?” ti an indawn che chun, an kuoma chun, “Nangni hi phurrik chu in nih, ka peihâwn ding cheu a nih, LALPA chun a tih,” tiin hril rawh.

en: And as for the prophet, and the priest, and the people, that shall say, The burden of Jehovah, I will even punish that man and his house.
hmr: Chun, zâwlnei amanih, thiem- pu amanih, chu mi laia pakhat, “LALPA phurrik chu” titu chu kei khawma chu mi le a sûngkuo chu hrem ka tih.

en: Thus shall ye say every one to his neighbor, and every one to his brother, What hath Jehovah answered? and, What hath Jehovah spoken?
hmr: Chuongchun, mi tinin mâni tuolbâwmhai kuoma le mâni unau- pahai kuomah, “LALPA chun ieng am a dawn a? LALPA chun ieng am a hril a?” tiin hril in tih.

en: And the burden of Jehovah shall ye mention no more: for every man’s own word shall be his burden; for ye have perverted the words of the living God, of Jehovah of hosts our God.
hmr: Chuongchun, LALPA phurrik chu hril ta ngai naw ti niu a, mi tin ta dingin ama thu ngei chu a phurrik a ni ding leiin; Pathien hring thuhai chu in lo fe kawipui ta sih a, ei Pathien sipaihai LALPA thu chu.

en: Thus shalt thou say to the prophet, What hath Jehovah answered thee? and, What hath Jehovah spoken?
hmr: Chuongchun, zâwlnei kuoma chun, “LALPA chun iengin am a dawn cheh a? LALPA chun ieng am a hril a?” tîng in ta.

en: But if ye say, The burden of Jehovah; therefore thus saith Jehovah: Because ye say this word, The burden of Jehovah, and I have sent unto you, saying, Ye shall not say, The burden of Jehovah;
hmr: Amiruokchu, “LALPA phurrik chu,” in ti chun, LALPA chun hieng ang hin a tih: Hi thu “LALPA phurrik chu,” in ti leiin, “LALPA phurrik chu, in ti ding a ni nawh,” ti dingin in kuomah mi ka hung tir a;

en: therefore, behold, I will utterly forget you, and I will cast you off, and the city that I gave unto you and to your fathers, away from my presence:
hmr: chuleiin, ngai ta u, nangni chu theinghil letdêr ka ti cheu a, khawpui nangni kuoma le in thlatuhai kuoma ka ipêk le hin ka hmaihmaa inthawk- in ka peihâwn ding cheu a nih;

en: and I will bring an everlasting reproach upon you, and a perpetual shame, which shall not be forgotten.
hmr: chun, in chunga chun kum- khuoa um ding ṭawngsekawk chu hung intlun ka ta, inzakna re lo leh, chuong chu theinghil ni ta ngai naw ni hai.

en: Jehovah showed me, and, behold, two baskets of figs set before the temple of Jehovah, after that Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon had carried away captive Jeconiah the son of Jehoiakim, king of Judah, and the princes of Judah, with the craftsmen and smiths, from Jerusalem, and had brought them to Babylon.
hmr: Chun, ngai ta, LALPA biekin hmaha sie theichang leikhawr pahni LALPA chun a mîn entir a; Babulon lal Nebukadnezzarin Juda lal Jehoiakim naupa Jekonia le Juda rama lalhai le, mi themthiemhai le, thîrsuhai chu Jerusalema inthawka salah a ṭhuoi a, Babulona a hung ṭhuoi tâwl hnung khan.

en: One basket had very good figs, like the figs that are first-ripe; and the other basket had very bad figs, which could not be eaten, they were so bad.
hmr: Leikhâwr pakhata chun theichang ṭhatak tak el, theichang hmin hmasa ang kha a um a; leikhâwr danga chun theichang setak tak el, fâk thei lo khawpa sie chu a um a.

en: Then said Jehovah unto me, What seest thou, Jeremiah? And I said, Figs; the good figs, very good; and the bad, very bad, that cannot be eaten, they are so bad.
hmr: Chun, LALPA chun ka kuomah, “Jeremia, ieng am i hmuh a?” a mi ta. Kei chun, “Theichanghai, theichang ṭha, ṭha êm êm le, a ṭha naw, ṭha naw takmeu el, fâk thei lo khawpa sie,” ka tih a.

en: And the word of Jehovah came unto me, saying,
hmr: Chun, LALPA thu chu ka kuom- ah a hung tlung a.

en: Thus saith Jehovah, the God of Israel: Like these good figs, so will I regard the captives of Judah, whom I have sent out of this place into the land of the Chaldeans, for good.
hmr: “LALPA Israel Pathien chun hieng hin a tih: An ṭhatna dinga, Juda sal intâng, hi hmuna inthawka Kaldai rama ka tirhai chu hi thei- chang ṭhahai ang hin ngai ka ta.

en: For I will set mine eyes upon them for good, and I will bring them again to this land: and I will build them, and not pull them down; and I will plant them, and not pluck them up.
hmr: An ṭhatna dingin an chungah ka mit inlên ka ta; chuongchun, hi rama ma hin hung ṭhuoi nâwk ka tih; chun, anni chu tungding ka ta, keihnuoi naw ningah; anni chu phun ka ta, phawi naw ningah.

en: And I will give them a heart to know me, that I am Jehovah: and they shall be my people, and I will be their God; for they shall return unto me with their whole heart.
hmr: An kuoma chun, LALPA ka nih ti mi hre dingin lungril pêng ka ta; chuongchun, ka mihai nîng an ta, kei khawm an Pathien nîng ka tih; an lungril po po leh ka kuomah an hung kîr nâwk ding a ni sih a.

en: And as the bad figs, which cannot be eaten, they are so bad, surely thus saith Jehovah, So will I give up Zedekiah the king of Judah, and his princes, and the residue of Jerusalem, that remain in this land, and them that dwell in the land of Egypt,
hmr: Chun, theichang ṭha nawhai, fâk thei lo khawp hiela siehai ang chun, Juda ram lal Zedekia le, a lalhai le, Jerusalema la mahlahai, hi rama la chênghai le chun, Aigupta rama chênghai po po le chun nghatsan ka tih, LALPA chun a tih;

en: I will even give them up to be tossed to and fro among all the kingdoms of the earth for evil; to be a reproach and a proverb, a taunt and a curse, in all places whither I shall drive them.
hmr: anni chu thil ṭha nawa hnung- tieng hmatienga sukṭita um dingin hnuoia lalram po pohai lai chun pe suok ka tih; ṭawngsekawk le, thuvara le hrânghla le inkhâmna ni dingin, anni ka hnawt suokna ding hmun po poahai chun pe suok ka tih.

en: And I will send the sword, the famine, and the pestilence, among them, till they be consumed from off the land that I gave unto them and to their fathers.
hmr: Chun, anni le an thlatuhai kuoma ram ka pêka inthawka an rênga an bohmang vawng hmakhat chun an hnunga chun kâwlhnâm dâm, hripui dâm, ṭâm dâm tir bawk ka tih,” tiin.

en: The word that came to Jeremiah concerning all the people of Judah, in the fourth year of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah, king of Judah (the same was the first year of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon),
hmr: Juda ram lal Josia naupa Jehoiakim inlal kum linaa Juda mipui po po chungthua Jeremia kuoma thu hung tlung chu: chu kum ma chu Babulon lal Nebukadnezzar inlal kum khatna a na;

en: which Jeremiah the prophet spake unto all the people of Judah, and to all the inhabitants of Jerusalem, saying:
hmr: chu chu zâwlnei Jeremia chun Juda mipui po po le Jerusalem hluo- tuhai po po kuoma chun a hril a,

en: From the thirteenth year of Josiah the son of Amon, king of Judah, even unto this day, these three and twenty years, the word of Jehovah hath come unto me, and I have spoken unto you, rising up early and speaking; but ye have not hearkened.
hmr: “Juda ram lal Amon naupa Josia inlal kum sâwmpathum kuma in- thawka vawisûn ni chen hin, hi kum sâwmhni pathum sûng hin LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung hlak a; chun, in kuoma chun ṭhahnem- ngaitakin ka lo hril hlak cheu a; amiruokchu, in awi ngai nawh a.

en: And Jehovah hath sent unto you all his servants the prophets, rising up early and sending them, (but ye have not hearkened, nor inclined your ear to hear),
hmr: Chun, LALPA chun inhmataka thoa anni chu hung tirin a siehlaw zâwlneihai po po chu in kuomah a hung tir a, amiruokchu, in lo ngai nawh a, in nahai khawm in sit bawk nawh.

en: saying, Return ye now every one from his evil way, and from the evil of your doings, and dwell in the land that Jehovah hath given unto you and to your fathers, from of old and even for evermore;
hmr: ‘Mi tin el chu tuhin in thilthaw indik nawhaia inthawk le, mâni lam- pui suola inthawk chun kîr seng unla; nangni le in thlatuhai kuoma inhma le kumkhuoa dinga, LALPAIN ram a pêk cheua chun chêng ro;

en: and go not after other gods to serve them, and to worship them, and provoke me not to anger with the work of your hands; and I will do you no hurt.
hmr: chun, pathien danghai chu an rawng bâwl ding le anni chibai bûk dingin zui naw unla, in kut sinthaw- hai chun mi suklungsen bawk naw ro; chuongchun, nangni khawm sukna naw ning cheu,’ an tih a.

en: Yet ye have not hearkened unto me, saith Jehovah; that ye may provoke me to anger with the work of your hands to your own hurt.
hmr: Ana chu, ka thu chu in ngai nawh a, LALPA chun a tih; in insuknatna dinga in kut sinthawhai chun in mi suklungsen a.

en: Therefore thus saith Jehovah of hosts: Because ye have not heard my words,
hmr: Chuleiin, sipaihai LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: Ka thuhai chu in ngai naw leiin,

en: behold, I will send and take all the families of the north, saith Jehovah, and I will send unto Nebuchadrezzar the king of Babylon, my servant, and will bring them against this land, and against the inhabitants thereof, and against all these nations round about; and I will utterly destroy them, and make them an astonishment, and a hissing, and perpetual desolations.
hmr: ngai ta u, mi tir ka ta, hmâr rama inthawk chun sûngkuohai po po chu ko ka tih, LALPA chun a tih; chun, ka siehlaw Babulon lal Nebukadnezzar kuoma chun mi tir ka ta; anni chu hi ram le, a hluotuhai le, a vêla hnamhai po po chunga do dingin hung ṭhuoi ka ta; chuongchun, anni chu sukse letdêr ka ta, makti ding le, inchekna ding le, kumkhaw rausanah ka siem ding a nih.

en: Moreover I will take from them the voice of mirth and the voice of gladness, the voice of the bridegroom and the voice of the bride, the sound of the millstones, and the light of the lamp.
hmr: Chu nawa khawm, anni laia inthawk chun, hlimna râwl dâm, lâwmna râwl dâm, mo neitu râwl dâm, mo râwl dâm, bu râwtna ri dâm, sathâu khâwnvar varna dâm chu sukbo vawng ka tih.

en: And this whole land shall be a desolation, and an astonishment; and these nations shall serve the king of Babylon seventy years.
hmr: Chuongchun, hi ram pumpui hi rausan le maktiah um a ta; chun, hnamhai chun kum sâwmsari sûng Babulon lal rawng chu bâwl an tih.

en: And it shall come to pass, when seventy years are accomplished, that I will punish the king of Babylon, and that nation, saith Jehovah, for their iniquity, and the land of the Chaldeans; and I will make it desolate for ever.
hmr: Chun, kum sâwmsari chu ân vawi pha chun, an suolna leiin, Babulon lal le, chu hnam le, Kaldai- hai ram chu hrem ka ta; kumkhuoa rausanah siem ka tih, LALPA chun a tih.

en: And I will bring upon that land all my words which I have pronounced against it, even all that is written in this book, which Jeremiah hath prophesied against all the nations.
hmr: Chu ram chunga ka thuhai tlung dinga ka hril tah, hi lekhabua ziek ta ngeihai, Jeremia chun hnam- hai chu dodala a lo hril tahai ngei chu hung intlungtir ka ta.

en: For many nations and great kings shall make bondmen of them, even of them; and I will recompense them according to their deeds, and according to the work of their hands.
hmr: Hnam tam takhai le lal ropuihai chun anni chu anni ngei chu, suokah siem an ta; chuongchun, anni chu an kuthai sinthaw ang pei le, an thil- thawhai ang peiin ka thung ding a nih,” tiin.

en: For thus saith Jehovah, the God of Israel, unto me: Take this cup of the wine of wrath at my hand, and cause all the nations, to whom I send thee, to drink it.
hmr: Israel Pathien, LALPA chun ka kuomah hieng hin a ti sih a: “Hi lung- insenna no ka kuta hi la la, hnam an kuoma ka tirnahai po po che chu indâwntir tâwl rawh.

en: And they shall drink, and reel to and fro, and be mad, because of the sword that I will send among them.
hmr: Chun, dâwn an ta, hnungtieng hmatieng insâwn an ta, invêt an tih; anni laia kâwlhnâm ka tir ding lei chun,” tiin.

en: Then took I the cup at Jehovah’s hand, and made all the nations to drink, unto whom Jehovah had sent me:
hmr: Chun, LALPA kuta no chu ka lâk a, LALPAIN a mi tirna hnamhai po po kân dâwntir a;

en: to wit, Jerusalem, and the cities of Judah, and the kings thereof, and the princes thereof, to make them a desolation, an astonishment, a hissing, and a curse, as it is this day;
hmr: Chuong chu hieng Jerusalem le Juda khawpuihai le a sûnga lalhai le rorêltuhai chu, vawisûn ni anga hi, anni chu râusan le maktia le, inchek- naa le, ṭawngsephura siem dingin;

en: Pharaoh king of Egypt, and his servants, and his princes, and all his people;
hmr: Aigupta lal Pharao le a siehlaw- hai, a lalhai le a mihai po po leh;

en: and all the mingled people, and all the kings of the land of Uz, and all the kings of the Philistines, and Ashkelon, and Gaza, and Ekron, and the remnant of Ashdod;
hmr: mi chilakhai po po, Uz rama lalhai po po, Philistin mihai rama lal po pohai, (Askelon, Gaza, Ekron le Asdoda la mahlahai leh);

en: Edom, and Moab, and the children of Ammon;
hmr: Edom, Moab le Ammon thlahai leh;

en: and all the kings of Tyre, and all the kings of Sidon, and the kings of the isle which is beyond the sea;
hmr: Zidon lalhai po po, Tura lalhai po po, tuisuoriet khêla thlierkâra lal- hai po po leh;

en: Dedan, and Tema, and Buz, and all that have the corners of their hair cut off;
hmr: Dedan, Tema, Buz le an barêp hmul vâwtuhai po po leh;

en: and all the kings of Arabia, and all the kings of the mingled people that dwell in the wilderness;
hmr: Arabia lalhai po po le thlalêra chêng mi chilakhai lalhai po po leh;

en: and all the kings of Zimri, and all the kings of Elam, and all the kings of the Medes;
hmr: Zimri lalhai po po, Elam lalhai po po, Media lalhai po po leh;

en: and all the kings of the north, far and near, one with another; and all the kingdoms of the world, which are upon the face of the earth: and the king of Sheshach shall drink after them.
hmr: hmâr tienga lalhai a hla le hnaia mihai, pakhat khatin, hnuoi phêk chunga um khawvêla lalram po po hai leh: chun, Sesak lal chun anni zoa chun dâwn vêng a tih.

en: And thou shalt say unto them, Thus saith Jehovah of hosts, the God of Israel: Drink ye, and be drunken, and spew, and fall, and rise no more, because of the sword which I will send among you.
hmr: Chun, an kuoma chun hieng hin tîng i ta: Israel Pathien, LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: Dâwn unla, inrui unla, inluok unla, tlu unla, tho nâwk ta naw ro, nangni laia kâwlhnâm ka hung tir ding lei chun.

en: And it shall be, if they refuse to take the cup at thy hand to drink, then shalt thou say unto them, Thus saith Jehovah of hosts: Ye shall surely drink.
hmr: Chun, i kuta no chu dâwn dinga an nuom naw chun, an kuoma chun hieng hin tîng i tih: “Sipaihai LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: In dâwn ngei ding a nih,” tiin.

en: For, lo, I begin to work evil at the city which is called by my name; and should ye be utterly unpunished? Ye shall not be unpunished; for I will call for a sword upon all the inhabitants of the earth, saith Jehovah of hosts.
hmr: Ngai ta, ka hming chawia khaw- pui inbûka uma chun thil ṭha naw ka thaw ṭan ta sih a, hrem dêr loin in um ding maw? Hrem lo ni naw ti niu; hnuoi hluotuhai po po chunga chun kâwlhnâm kân lêngtir ding a ni sih a, sipaihai LALPA chun a tih.

en: Therefore prophesy thou against them all these words, and say unto them, Jehovah will roar from on high, and utter his voice from his holy habitation; he will mightily roar against his fold; he will give a shout, as they that tread the grapes, against all the inhabitants of the earth.
hmr: Chuleiin, hieng thuhai po po hi anni kalin hril la, an kuoma chun, “LALPA chu chungtienga inthawkin hung inrûm a ta, a chêngna inthienga inthawk chun a râwl chu hung in- suong a tih; a hlo petna hmuna chun thilthawtheitakin inrûm a ta; grêp sir sâwrtuhai ang chun ama chu hnuoi chung hluotuhai po po chunga chun khêk a tih.

en: A noise shall come even to the end of the earth; for Jehovah hath a controversy with the nations; he will enter into judgment with all flesh: as for the wicked, he will give them to the sword, saith Jehovah.
hmr: Ri chu hnuoi tâwp chenah hung tlung a ta; LALPA chun hnamhai le chun inkalna an nei sih a; mi tin chu phût a ta; mi rilohai ruok chu kâwl- hnâm pêng a tih, LALPA chun a tih,” tiin.

en: Thus saith Jehovah of hosts, Behold, evil shall go forth from nation to nation, and a great tempest shall be raised up from the uttermost parts of the earth.
hmr: Sipaihai LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: Ngai ta u, thil ṭha naw chu hnam khata inthawkin hnam dang chunga chun fe pei a ta, hnuoi tâwp- taka inthawk chun thlipui nasatak chu hung suok a tih.

en: And the slain of Jehovah shall be at that day from one end of the earth even unto the other end of the earth: they shall not be lamented, neither gathered, nor buried; they shall be dung upon the face of the ground.
hmr: Chun, chu nia chun LALPA suk- hlumna chu hnuoi tâwp khing khata inthawka a tâwp khingtieng chen nîng a ta; chuonghai chu sûn ni naw ni hai a, lâk khâwm khawm ni naw ni hai a, phûm khawm ni bawk naw ni hai; leihnuoi chunga êk el ni lem an tih.

en: Wail, ye shepherds, and cry; and wallow in ashes, ye principal of the flock; for the days of your slaughter and of your dispersions are fully come, and ye shall fall like a goodly vessel.
hmr: Nangni berâmpuhai, inrûm unla, khêk ro; nangni ran ruol hotu- hai, vutah nangni le nangni intleng ro; that in nina ding ni chu a hung tlung tah a, nangni chu kei nâwi neng ka ti cheu a, bêl ditumtak angin tlûng in tih.

en: And the shepherds shall have no way to flee, nor the principal of the flock to escape.
hmr: Chun, berâmpuhai chun tlân- hmangna ding lampui nei naw ni hai a, ran ruol hotuhai khawm chun pumpelna ding nei bawk naw ni hai.

en: A voice of the cry of the shepherds, and the wailing of the principal of the flock! for Jehovah layeth waste their pasture.
hmr: Berâmpuhai khêk râwl ri le ran ruol hotuhai inrûm ri chu! LALPA chun an ran tlatna hmunhai chu a suksiet ta sih a.

en: And the peaceable folds are brought to silence because of the fierce anger of Jehovah.
hmr: Chun, LALPA lunginsenna ṭiumna lei chun ran in muongum- takhai dâm chu an to ṭawk ṭawk a.

en: He hath left his covert, as the lion; for their land is become an astonishment because of the fierceness of the oppressing sword, and because of his fierce anger.
hmr: Sakeibaknei angin a chîmbuk a mâksan a, a lunginsen ṭiumna lei le, nêksâwrna kâwlhnâm ṭiumna lei chun an ram chu a se zo ta sih a.

en: In the beginning of the reign of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah, king of Judah, came this word from Jehovah, saying,
hmr: Juda lal Josia naupa Jehoia- kim rorêl ṭantir laiin hi thu hi LALPA kuoma inthawkin a hung tlung a:

en: Thus saith Jehovah: Stand in the court of Jehovah’s house, and speak unto all the cities of Judah, which come to worship in Jehovah’s house, all the words that I command thee to speak unto them; diminish not a word.
hmr: “LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: LALPA in huon tuollaia chun ngîr la, an kuoma thuhril ding ka thupêk po po che chu, LALPA ina Pathien be dinga hung khâwm, Juda khawpui- hai po po kuoma chun hril rawh; thu khat chau khawm ip naw rawh.

en: It may be they will hearken, and turn every man from his evil way; that I may repent me of the evil which I purpose to do unto them because of the evil of their doings.
hmr: Anni chun ngai an ta, mi tin chu mâni lampui suola inthawk chun an kîr el thei a nih; chuongchun, an thilthawhai suol leia an chunga thil ṭhalo thaw dinga ka tumhai khawm chu kân sîr el thei a nih.

en: And thou shalt say unto them, Thus saith Jehovah: If ye will not hearken to me, to walk in my law, which I have set before you,
hmr: Chun, an kuoma chun hieng hin tîng i ta: LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: in hmaa ka sie ka dân chu hraw dinga ka thu in ngai naw chun,

en: to hearken to the words of my servants the prophets, whom I send unto you, even rising up early and sending them, but ye have not hearkened;
hmr: inhmataka thoa anni hung tira, ka siehlaw zâwlneihai in kuoma ka hungtirhai thuhai in ngai dinghai chu, in ngai ta nawh a;

en: then will I make this house like Shiloh, and will make this city a curse to all the nations of the earth.
hmr: chuongchun, hi in hi Silo angah siem ka ta, hi khawpui hi hnuoia hnam po pohai ṭawngse hnâwknaah siem bawk ka tih,” tiin.

en: And the priests and the prophets and all the people heard Jeremiah speaking these words in the house of Jehovah.
hmr: Chun, thiempuhai, zâwlneihai le mi po po chun hieng thuhai hi LALPA ina Jeremia chun a hril chu an hriet a.

en: And it came to pass, when Jeremiah had made an end of speaking all that Jehovah had commanded him to speak unto all the people, that the priests and the prophets and all the people laid hold on him, saying, Thou shalt surely die.
hmr: Chun, LALPAIN hril dinga thu a pêk po po mipuihai po po kuoma Jeremia chun a hril zo chun, thiem- puhai le, zâwlneihai le mipui po po chun ama chu an man a, “I thi ngei ngei ding a nih.

en: Why hast thou prophesied in the name of Jehovah, saying, This house shall be like Shiloh, and this city shall be desolate, without inhabitant? And all the people were gathered unto Jeremiah in the house of Jehovah.
hmr: Iengdinga LALPA hminga thu hrila, ‘Hi in hi Silo ang nîng a ta, hi khawpui hi hluotu um loa rausan nîng a tih,’ i ti am a na?” an tih a. Chuongchun, LALPA ina chun Jeremia chu mipui po po chun an bâwr ta hut hut a.

en: And when the princes of Judah heard these things, they came up from the king’s house unto the house of Jehovah; and they sat in the entry of the new gate of Jehovah’s house.
hmr: Juda ram lalhai chu chuong thuhai chu an lo hriet chun, lal ina inthawk chun LALPA ina chun an hung tâwl a; chuongchun, LALPA in dai kawtkhâr thar lûtnaa chun an ṭhung tâwl a.

en: Then spake the priests and the prophets unto the princes and to all the people, saying, This man is worthy of death; for he hath prophesied against this city, as ye have heard with your ears.
hmr: Chun, thiempuhai le zâwlneihai chun lalhai le mipuihai po po kuoma chun, “Hi mipa hi thi tlâk a nih, in nahaia in hriet ta ang ngei khan hi khawpui siet ding thu a hril a nih,” tiin an hril a.

en: Then spake Jeremiah unto all the princes and to all the people, saying, Jehovah sent me to prophesy against this house and against this city all the words that ye have heard.
hmr: Chun, Jeremia chun lalhai po po le mipuihai po po kuoma chun thu a hril tah a, “LALPA chun thu in lo hriet ta ang po po khan hi khawpui le hi in siet ding thu hril dingin a mi hung tir a nih.

en: Now therefore amend your ways and your doings, and obey the voice of Jehovah your God; and Jehovah will repent him of the evil that he hath pronounced against you.
hmr: Chuleiin, tuhin in thilthawhai le in umdânhai chu siemṭha unla, LALPA in Pathien râwl chu awi ro; chuongchun, nangni dodâla LALPA- IN thil ṭha naw a lo hril ta khawm chu lamlêt a tih.

en: But as for me, behold, I am in your hand: do with me as is good and right in your eyes.
hmr: Chun, keia chungchâng thua chun, in kutah ka um a nih, in mithmua ṭha le ân dik ang chun ka chungah thaw el ro.

en: Only know ye for certain that, if ye put me to death, ye will bring innocent blood upon yourselves, and upon this city, and upon the inhabitants thereof; for of a truth Jehovah hath sent me unto you to speak all these words in your ears.
hmr: Hi hi hre ngei unla, kei in mi sukhlum chun, nangni chunga le, hi khawpui chunga le, chu chu hluo- tuhai chunga chun mi thiem thisen chu in intlungtir ngei ding a nih; thil dikah, LALPA chun in na hrieta hieng thuhai po po hi hril dingin in kuomah a mi hung tir a ni sih a,” tiin.

en: Then said the princes and all the people unto the priests and to the prophets: This man is not worthy of death; for he hath spoken to us in the name of Jehovah our God.
hmr: Chun, lalhai le mipuihai po po chun zâwlneihai le thiempuhai kuoma chun, “Hi mipa hi thi tlâk a ni naw ie; ama hi LALPA ei Pathien hmingin thu a hril a ni sih a,” an tih a.

en: Then rose up certain of the elders of the land, and spake to all the assembly of the people, saying,
hmr: Chun, chu rama upa ṭhenkhat- hai chu an tho a, mipui inkhâwmhai po po kuoma chun thu an hril tah a,

en: Micah the Morashtite prophesied in the days of Hezekiah king of Judah; and he spake to all the people of Judah, saying, Thus saith Jehovah of hosts: Zion shall be plowed as a field, and Jerusalem shall become heaps, and the mountain of the house as the high places of a forest.
hmr: “Moras mi Mikaia khan Juda ram lal Hezekia inlal laiin thu a hril a; Juda rama mi po pohai kuoma chun ‘Sipaihai LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: Zion chu lo anga inlet nîng a ta; Jerusalem chu hmunhnawk sie- khâwm nîng a ta, in hmun tlâng chu ramhnuoia bâwlhmun tlâng ang nîng a tih,’ tiin.

en: Did Hezekiah king of Judah and all Judah put him to death? did he not fear Jehovah, and entreat the favor of Jehovah, and Jehovah repented him of the evil which he had pronounced against them? Thus should we commit great evil against our own souls.
hmr: Juda ram lal Hezekia le, Juda mihai po po chun ama chu an that el am a nih? LALPA chu a ṭih a, LALPA ditsakna chu a hnih a; chuongchun, LALPA chun an chunga thil ṭha naw a lo hril ta kha a lamlêt a ni nâwm a ni kha? Chuong a ni chun eini thlatuhai ta ding ngeiin thil ṭha nawtak ei thaw a ni ding a nih,” an tih a.

en: And there was also a man that prophesied in the name of Jehovah, Uriah the son of Shemaiah of Kiriath-jearim; and he prophesied against this city and against this land according to all the words of Jeremiah.
hmr: Chun, mi pakhat, LALPA hminga thuhriltu, Kiriath-Jearima Semaia naupa Uria chu a um a, ama khawm chun Jeremia thu ang tak pei chun hi ram le hi khawpui siet ding thu a hril veh a;

en: And when Jehoiakim the king, with all his mighty men, and all the princes, heard his words, the king sought to put him to death; but when Uriah heard it, he was afraid, and fled, and went into Egypt.
hmr: chun, lal Jehoiakim le, a mi hrâthai po po le, lalhai po poin a hril an hriet chun lal chun ama chu sukhlum a tum tah a; nisienla- khawm, Uria chun a lo hriet chun a ṭih a, a tlân a, Aigupta rama chun a fe tah a;

en: And Jehoiakim the king sent men into Egypt, namely, Elnathan the son of Achbor, and certain men with him, into Egypt;
hmr: chun, lal Jehoiakim chun Aigupta rama chun mihai a tir a, Akbor naupa Elnathan le mi ṭhen- khat chu Aiguptaa chun a tir a;

en: and they fetched forth Uriah out of Egypt, and brought him unto Jehoiakim the king, who slew him with the sword, and cast his dead body into the graves of the common people.
hmr: Aigupta rama inthawk chun Uria chu an hung ṭhuoi a, lal Jehoia- kim kuoma chun an hung ṭhuoi tah a, chun, ama chun kâwlhnâmin a that a, a ruong chu mi narânhai thlâna chun a pei lût a.

en: But the hand of Ahikam the son of Shaphan was with Jeremiah, that they should not give him into the hand of the people to put him to death.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, Saphan naupa Ahikam kut chu Jeremia kuoma chun a um a, ama chu that dinga mipui kuoma an pêk nawna dingin.

en: In the beginning of the reign of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah, king of Judah, came this word unto Jeremiah from Jehovah, saying,
hmr: Juda lal Josia naupa Jehoia- kim rorêl ṭantir lai chun LALPA kuoma inthawkin hi thu hi Jeremia kuomah a hung tlung a,

en: Thus saith Jehovah to me: Make thee bonds and bars, and put them upon thy neck;
hmr: “LALPA chun ka kuoma chun hieng hin a tih: Rîngkawlhai le a hnamhai i ta dingin siem la, i rînga chun bât rawh;

en: and send them to the king of Edom, and to the king of Moab, and to the king of the children of Ammon, and to the king of Tyre, and to the king of Sidon, by the hand of the messengers that come to Jerusalem unto Zedekiah king of Judah:
hmr: Edom lal dâm, Moab lal dâm, Ammon thlahai lal dâm, Tura lal dâm, Zidon lal dâm kuoma chun Juda lal Zedekia kuoma Jerusalema hunghai thangkohai kuta chun inphur rawh;

en: and give them a charge unto their masters, saying, Thus saith Jehovah of hosts, the God of Israel, Thus shall ye say unto your masters:
hmr: an hotuhai kuoma chun thuneina pe la, hienghin ti rawh, ‘Israel Pathien LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: In hotuhai kuoma chun hieng ang hin hril in tih:

en: I have made the earth, the men and the beasts that are upon the face of the earth, by my great power and by my outstretched arm; and I give it unto whom it seemeth right unto me.
hmr: ka bân phar le ka thilthawtheina nasatak chun hnuoi phêk chunga ramsahai le mihriem le leihnuoi chu ka siem a; chun, ka ngaia pêk ding âwm kuoma chun ka pêk tah a.

en: And now have I given all these lands into the hand of Nebuchadnezzar the king of Babylon, my servant; and the beasts of the field also have I given him to serve him.
hmr: Tuhin chuong ramhai po po chu ka siehlaw Nebukadnezzar, Babulon lal kuoma chun ka pêk tah a nih, ramhnuoia ramsahai khawm chu ama rawng bâwl dingin ka pêk a nih.

en: And all the nations shall serve him, and his son, and his son’s son, until the time of his own land come: and then many nations and great kings shall make him their bondman.
hmr: Chuongchun, ama ram ngei a ni hun a tlung hmakhat chun, hnamhai chun ama le a naupasal le, a naupasal naupa rawng chu bâwl an tih; chuongchun, hnam tamtakhai le lal ropuitakhai chun ama chu suokin man an tih.

en: And it shall come to pass, that the nation and the kingdom which will not serve the same Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon, and that will not put their neck under the yoke of the king of Babylon, that nation will I punish, saith Jehovah, with the sword, and with the famine, and with the pestilence, until I have consumed them by his hand.
hmr: Chun, hnam le lalram Babulon lal Nebukadnezzar rawng bâwl lohai le, Babulon lal rîngkawl hnuoia an rîng sie nuom lohai chu, LALPA chun a tih; ama kut ngeia ka sukbohmang vawng hmakhat chun, anni chu hripui dâm, ṭâm dâm, kâwlhnâm dâmin hrem ka tih.

en: But as for you, hearken ye not to your prophets, nor to your diviners, nor to your dreams, nor to your soothsayers, nor to your sorcerers, that speak unto you, saying, Ye shall not serve the king of Babylon:
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, nangni chung- thu ruoka chun, in zâwlneihai, in khawhri zâwlhai, in manghai, in dawithiemhai, in aisân thiemhai “Babulon lal rawng chu bâwl naw ti niu,” tituhai chu ngai naw ro;

en: for they prophesy a lie unto you, to remove you far from your land, and that I should drive you out, and ye should perish.
hmr: in rama inthawka hlataka sawnhmang ding cheuin anni chun khêlthu an hril cheu a ni sih a; nangni chu ka hnawt suok cheu a, in bo- hmangna dingin.

en: But the nation that shall bring their neck under the yoke of the king of Babylon, and serve him, that nation will I let remain in their own land, saith Jehovah; and they shall till it, and dwell therein.
hmr: Amiruokchu, Babulon lal rîng- kawl hnuoia an rîng dawh a, ama rawngbâwltuhai chu hnam ngei chu an rama chun inumtir zing ka tih, LALPA chun a tih; inlêt an ta, chêng zing an tih,’” tiin.

en: And I spake to Zedekiah king of Judah according to all these words, saying, Bring your necks under the yoke of the king of Babylon, and serve him and his people, and live.
hmr: Chun, hieng thuhai ang tak hin Juda lal Zedekia kuoma chun thu ka hril a, “Babulon lal rîngkawl hnuoia chun in rînghai hung daw unla, ama le a mihai rawng chu bâwl unla, hringin um ro.

en: Why will ye die, thou and thy people, by the sword, by the famine, and by the pestilence, as Jehovah hath spoken concerning the nation that will not serve the king of Babylon?
hmr: Babulon lal rawng bâwl lo ding hnam chungthua LALPAIN a lo hril ta angin, ieng dingin am nang le i mihai chu hripui dâmin, ṭâmin le kawlhnâma dâm chun thîng in ta?

en: And hearken not unto the words of the prophets that speak unto you, saying, Ye shall not serve the king of Babylon; for they prophesy a lie unto you.
hmr: In kuoma ‘Babulon lal rawng chu in bâwl ding a ni nawh,’ titu zâwlneihai thu chu ngai naw ro: in kuoma chun thukhêl an hril sih a.

en: For I have not sent them, saith Jehovah, but they prophesy falsely in my name; that I may drive you out, and that ye may perish, ye, and the prophets that prophesy unto you.
hmr: LALPA chun a tih: Anni chu ka tir si nawh a, nisienlakhawm, ka hmingin thukhêl chu an hril a nih; nangni chu ka hnawt suok theina ding cheu le, nangni le zâwlnei in kuoma thuhriltuhai chu in bohmang theina dingin,” tiin.

en: Also I spake to the priests and to all this people, saying, Thus saith Jehovah: Hearken not to the words of your prophets that prophesy unto you, saying, Behold, the vessels of Jehovah’s house shall now shortly be brought again from Babylon; for they prophesy a lie unto you.
hmr: Thiempuhai le hi hnam po pohai kuoma chun hieng hin ka hril bawk a, “LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: In kuomah, ‘Ngai ta u, LALPA bûr le bêlhai chu Babulona inthawkin sâwt- nawtêa hung lâk nîng an tih,’ titu in zâwlneihai thu chu ngai naw ro; in kuomah thukhêl an hril a ni sih a.

en: Hearken not unto them; serve the king of Babylon, and live: wherefore should this city become a desolation?
hmr: Anni thu chu ngai naw unla, Babulon lal rawng chu bâwl unla, damin um ro, ieng dingin am hi khawpui hi râusanin um el a ta?

en: But if they be prophets, and if the word of Jehovah be with them, let them now make intercession to Jehovah of hosts, that the vessels which are left in the house of Jehovah, and in the house of the king of Judah, and at Jerusalem, go not to Babylon.
hmr: Amiruokchu, zâwlnei an nia, an kuoma chun LALPA thu chu a um chun, tuhin sipaihai LALPA kuoma chun hnina siem hai sienla, LALPA ina bûr le bêl mâksana la umhai le, Jerusalem le lal ina mâksana la umhai chu Babulona a fe ve nawna dingin.

en: For thus saith Jehovah of hosts concerning the pillars, and concerning the sea, and concerning the bases, and concerning the residue of the vessels that are left in this city,
